lastfm.summary: “Belize” is the sixth track on "Cheat Codes", and it features a posthumous verse from the late rapper MF DOOM, who passed away on October 31, 2020. This is the second time Danger Mouse, Black Thought and MF DOOM have been on a track together, the first being “Mad Nice”, a bonus track from MF DOOM & Danger Mouse’s collaborative album "The Mouse & The Mask". Danger Mouse talked about the song’s creation in an interview with The Ringer, here’s what he said: Read more on Last.fm.
